name: material_released
description: Hazardous material involved in the incident

name: hazardous_class
description: DOT hazardous class of the material released.

name: electrification
description: Whether an battery gas release or potential release were involved in causing or exacerbating the hazard.

name: hazard_physical_state
description: Physical state of the hazardous material.

name: release_factors
comments: Value 1 and Value 2 for primary and secondary factors

name: evacuation_count
description: How many members of the general public were evacuated as a result of the hazardous material?

name: transportation_impact
description: Whether a major transportation artery or facility was closed.

name: description_of_events
description: Describe the events that led to the incident and the actions taken after it was discovered, including mitigation efforts.

name: recommendations
description: Describe the suggestions or changes recommended to prevent recurrence.
